title: Ritz-Carlton Owner to Sell Hotels in New York and Washington
description: Westbrook Partners is selling Ritz-Carlton hotels in New York and Washington, as affluent consumers demonstrate continued willingness to pay up for luxury travel.
content: Westbrook Partners is selling Ritz-Carlton hotels in New York and Washington, as affluent consumers demonstrate continued willingness to pay up for luxury travel.
